resources.string: MDF Ganpati Makhar with Bamboo Cages

This one is beautiful MDF Ganpati Makhar with Bamboo Cages. My(Aditi Sunita Ulhas Deshpande) own concept and design. This is made up of 3 completely separable MDF sheets. Jali is decorated with small cute golden bells. Also having 5 handmade cute bamboo cages , decorated with paper flowers. Accompanied with cute little birds. Complete makhar is eco-friendly , environment friendly.
